member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO_INFO structure contains more detailed information about an audio logotype.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO_INFO.dwFileSize
member.summary: The size, in octets, of the audio.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO_INFO.dwPlayTime
member.summary: The length of play time, in milliseconds, of the audio.

summary.para: The number of channels in the audio file. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The audio file contains four channels.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO_INFO.dwSampleRate
member.summary: The sample rate of the audio, in samples per second. This member is optional and may be zero.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO_INFO.pwszLanguage
member.summary: The address of a null-terminated IA5 string that contains the RFC 3066 language identifier that specifies the language of the audio. This member is optional and may be NULL.
